page.title: 16Housing
page.content: There are lots of different types of housing in our area. Some cottages are very old but a lot of houses have been built since the 1930's. There are some small council housing estates in both villages. Most of the houses are semi-detached with three bedrooms but there are some detached houses and one or two terraces. The older houses are made of stone but the more modern houses are built with red bricks or concrete blocks. In both villages quite a few houses have been bought by Downside Abbey and School. Staff who work there live in the houses.
